statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount, customer_id FROM SalesData;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE customer_id = 500 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY average_sale DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_id = '7d8f4567-b585-4fab-85cf-5c0b0e5284e1';
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY category;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM Products INNER JOIN Sales ON Products.product_id = Sales.product_id WHERE Products.category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM Products WHERE category = 'Clothing') ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT category_name FROM product_categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT c.customer_name, c.contact_email, pd.product_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN sales_data sd ON c.customer_id = sd.sales_id INNER JOIN product_categories pc ON sd.product_name = pc.category_name WHERE pc.parent_category_id IS NULL;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM sales_data INNER JOIN customers ON sales_data.customer_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM Products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT order_id, sale_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE sale_id = 1001 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales JOIN Products ON Sales.product_id = Products.product_id
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND unit_price > 500 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, city, product_name, sale_amount FROM Customers JOIN Sales ON Customers.customer_id = Sales.customer_id JOIN Products ON Sales.product_id = Products.product_id
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.city, customers.country, orders.quantity_ordered FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.quantity_ordered > 5 ORDER BY customers.customer_name;

SELECT products.product_name, products.category, sales_data.quantity_sold, sales_data.price FROM products JOIN sales_data ON products.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE sales_data.quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY sales_data.quantity_sold DESC, sales_data.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
